message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO

Reasoning: The paper focuses on action recognition using depth data, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method involves feature extraction and classification, which are also relevant to machine learning (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the effectiveness of the proposed method in dealing with noise and occlusions, which are common challenges in robotics (cs.RO). Finally, the use of Bag-of-Visual-Words (BoVW) model is a common technique in computer vision and machine learning, which further supports the relevance of this paper to the aforementioned sub-categories.
